hero.name: Amilcar Barahona
hero.description: 10 years of experience as a Software Engineer located in Venezuela, developer of web and mobile applications with high adaptability in conception, formulation and execution processes of highly scalable projects.

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.paragraph1: I have 10 years of experience as a software developer and autodidactic enthusiasm. I led FrontEnd development and supervised backend developments as Technical Lead at Cencosud S.A., successfully establishing a non-relational data model for the post-purchase experience sector.
aboutMe.paragraph2: This planning served as a starting point to develop a solid transversal base in micro-frontend technology, which allowed consolidating cost reduction objectives of up to 30% in relation to third-party dependent services, many of which lacked stability and operability affecting the purchasing flow for clients in the company.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's work together
contact.description: Ready to start a project? I'd love to hear from you.
